data.name: label2.Text
data.value: Please advice the above creditat my/our risk and cost by telegraph or SWIFT, either in words of fifues, it is being understood that the bank will not be liable or responsible for the consequences of ant failure to dispatch/advice/anydelay/mistake/omission/misinterpretation/irregularity/error in indemnification which may happen in or about or after its dispatch/transmission or receipt, or for any loss/damage caused by any act or omission/negligence or otherwise, or for the retention of the sum should cricumstance be such as, in your judgment or in the jugment of your agents/correspondents to render such retention expedient until confirmation by letter of the telegraphic advice or for the consequences thereof.

data.name: label5.Text
data.value: I/We do hereby indemnify and save harmless the Bank issuing a copy of the telegraphic message/SWIFT to me /us at its sole discretion, as it is adocument of the Bank, which is given for reference,purposes only.Thereby Bank is not liable for any amendment/alteration/duplication/misuse of this copy and records preserved at telegraphic system/SWIFT which is/are denoted as final for any event in question.

data.name: label6.Text
data.value: I/We do hereby indemnity that this credit is not made for money Laundering, terrorist financing that this credit is not made for money laundering, terrorist financing or illegal activities in any state; and bank reserve the right suspend the transfer for above and/or missing of required information

data.name: label7.Text
data.value: I/We herby undertake to submit to you within 180 days from this date allowed in current statutes, a copy of commercial invoice and a copy of the customs declaration both duly stamped by customs of Sri Lanka in respect of the import of goods or services,

data.name: label9.Text
data.value: I/We hereby confirm our acceptance to the above terms and conditions and any rules and regulations and any Directions and Guidelines issued by Central Bnak of Sri Lanka and/ or any respective authorities fro this transaction and I/We pay the Bank in full all amounts of this transfer by CASH/CHEQUE (no) /authorizing the Bank to debit the following Account/Accounts maintained with the bank Account No: At Bank of Ceylon Baranch.
